alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:44PM CDT until April 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SAC AND NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kiron, or 11 miles southeast of Ida Grove, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Schleswig, Kiron and Deloit. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
